trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Get-Random
trans-unit.target: Get-Random

trans-unit.source: Get-Random
trans-unit.target: Get-Random

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Gets a random number, or selects objects randomly from a collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个随机数，或从集合中随机选择对象。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: RandomNumberParameterSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: RandomNumberParameterSet （默认值）

trans-unit.source: RandomListItemParameterSet
trans-unit.target: RandomListItemParameterSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Random** cmdlet gets a randomly selected number.
trans-unit.target: **Get-random** cmdlet 将获取一个随机选择的数字。

trans-unit.source: If you submit a collection of objects to **Get-Random**, it gets one or more randomly selected objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果提交到的对象的集合， **Get-random**, ，则它获取一个或多个集合中随机选择的对象。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters or input, a **Get-Random** command returns a randomly selected 32-bit unsigned integer between 0 (zero) and Int32.MaxValue (0x7FFFFFFF, 2,147,483,647).
trans-unit.target: 没有参数或输入， **Get-random** 命令返回 0 （零） 和 Int32.MaxValue （0x7FFFFFFF，2147483647） 之间的随机选择的 32 位无符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: You can use the parameters of **Get-Random** to specify a seed number, minimum and maximum values, and the number of objects returned from a submitted collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的参数 **Get-random** 指定种子数字、 最小值和最大值和对象的数目从集合中返回已提交。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command gets a random integer between 0 (zero) and Int32.MaxValue.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取一个介于 0（零）和 Int32.MaxValue 之间的随机整数。

trans-unit.source: This command gets a random integer between 0 (zero) and 99.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取一个介于 0（零）和 99 之间的随机整数。

trans-unit.source: This command gets a random integer between -100 and 99.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取一个介于 -100 和 99 之间的随机整数。

trans-unit.source: This command gets a random floating-point number greater than or equal to 10.7 and less than 20.92.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取一个大于或等于 10.7 且小于 20.92 的随机浮点数。

trans-unit.source: This command gets a randomly selected number from the specified array.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将从指定的数组中获取一个随机选择的数字。

trans-unit.source: This command gets three randomly selected numbers in random order from the array.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将按随机顺序从数组中获取三个随机选择的数字。

trans-unit.source: This command returns the entire collection in random order.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将按随机顺序返回整个集合。

trans-unit.source: The value of the **Count** parameter is the MaxValue static property of integers.
trans-unit.target: 值 **计数** 参数是整数的 MaxValue 静态属性。

trans-unit.source: To return an entire collection in random order, enter any number that is greater than or equal to the number of objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要按随机顺序返回整个集合，请输入任一大于或等于该集合中的对象数的数字。

trans-unit.source: This command returns a random value from a non-numeric collection.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将从非数值集合中返回一个随机值。

trans-unit.source: This command gets a randomly selected process from the collection of processes on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将从计算机上的进程集合中获取一个随机选择的进程。

trans-unit.source: This command runs a command on a series of remote computers in random order.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将按随机顺序在一系列远程计算机上运行命令。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the effect of using the **SetSeed** parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示使用的效果 **SetSeed** 参数。

trans-unit.source: Because **SetSeed** produces non-random behavior, it is typically used only to reproduce results, such as when debugging or analyzing a script.
trans-unit.target: 因为 **SetSeed** 产生非随机行为，它通常仅用于重现结果，例如调试或分析脚本。

trans-unit.source: These commands get a randomly selected sample of 50 files from the C: drive of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令将从本地计算机的 c: 驱动器中获取随机选择的包含 50 个文件的样本。

trans-unit.source: This command gets a random integer less than 10001.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将获取一个小于 10001 的随机整数。

trans-unit.source: Because the Maximum parameter has position 1, you can omit the parameter name when the value is the first or only unnamed parameter in the command.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Maximum 参数具有位置 1，所以当该值是命令中的第一个或唯一一个未命名的参数时，可以忽略参数名。

trans-unit.source: These commands attempt to get randomly generated 64-bit numbers.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令将尝试获取随机生成的 64 位数字。

trans-unit.source: The first command succeeds, but the second command fails.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令成功了，但第二个命令却失败了。

trans-unit.source: When the value of **Minimum** is a 32-bit integer, the default value of **Maximum** is Int32.MaxValues.
trans-unit.target: 时的值 **最小值** 是一个 32 位整数，默认值为 **最大** 为 Int32.MaxValues。

trans-unit.source: The command fails because the value of **Maximum** must be greater than the value of **Minimum**.
trans-unit.target: 命令失败，因为值 **最大** 必须是大于值 **最小值**。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Count
trans-unit.target: 计数

trans-unit.source: Determines how many objects are returned.
trans-unit.target: 确定将返回的对象数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: If the value of **Count** exceeds the number of objects in the collection, **Get-Random** returns all of the objects in random order.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **计数** 超过在集合中，对象的数目 **Get-random** 按随机顺序返回的所有对象。

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies a collection of objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Random** gets randomly selected objects in random order from the collection.
trans-unit.target: **Get-random** 按随机顺序从集合中获取随机选择的对象。

trans-unit.source: Enter the objects, a variable that contains the objects, or a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 输入对象、一个包含这些对象的变量，或可获取这些对象的命令或表达式。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe a collection of objects to **Get-Random**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道向对象的集合， **Get-random**。

trans-unit.source: -Maximum
trans-unit.target: 的最大

trans-unit.source: Specifies a maximum value for the random number.
trans-unit.target: 指定随机数的最大值。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Random** returns a value that is less than the maximum (not equal).
trans-unit.target: **Get-random** 返回值是小于最大值 （不等于）。

trans-unit.source: Enter a 32-bit integer or a double-precision floating-point number, or an object that can be converted to an integer or double, such as a numeric string ("100").
trans-unit.target: 输入一个 32 位整数或双精度浮点数，或一个可以转换为整数或双精度的对象，如数值字符串（“100”）。

trans-unit.source: On a 64-bit computer, you can also enter a 64-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 在 64 位计算机上，还可以输入一个 64 位整数。

trans-unit.source: The value of **Maximum** must be greater than (not equal to) the value of **Minimum**.
trans-unit.target: 值 **最大** 必须晚于 （不等于） 的值 **最小值**。

trans-unit.source: If the value of **Maximum** or **Minimum** is a floating-point number, **Get-Random** returns a randomly selected floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **最大** 或 **最小值** 是浮点数， **Get-random** 返回一个随机选择的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: If the value of **Minimum** is a double (a floating-point number), the default value of **Maximum** is Double.MaxValue.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **最小值** 是双精度 （浮点数） 的默认值 **最大** 为 Double.MaxValue。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the default value is Int32.MaxValue.
trans-unit.target: 否则，默认值为 Int32.MaxValue。

trans-unit.source: On a 64-bit computer, if the value of **Minimum** is a 32-bit integer, the default value of **Maximum** is Int32.MaxValue.
trans-unit.target: 在 64 位计算机上，如果值 **最小值** 是一个 32 位整数，默认值为 **最大** 为 Int32.MaxValue。

trans-unit.source: If the value of **Minimum** is a double (a floating-point number), the default value of **Maximum** is Double.MaxValue.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **最小值** 是双精度 （浮点数） 的默认值 **最大** 为 Double.MaxValue。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the default value is Int64.MaxValue.
trans-unit.target: 否则，默认值为 Int64.MaxValue。

trans-unit.source: -Minimum
trans-unit.target: -最小值

trans-unit.source: Specifies a minimum value for the random number.
trans-unit.target: 指定随机数的最小值。

trans-unit.source: Enter a 32-bit integer or a double-precision floating-point number, or an object that can be converted to an integer or double, such as a numeric string ("100").
trans-unit.target: 输入一个 32 位整数或双精度浮点数，或一个可以转换为整数或双精度的对象，如数值字符串（“100”）。

trans-unit.source: On a 64-bit computer, you can enter a 64-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: 在 64 位计算机上，可以输入一个 64 位整数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: The value of **Minimum** must be less than (not equal to) the value of **Maximum**.
trans-unit.target: 值 **最小值** 必须 （不等于） 小于的值 **最大**。

trans-unit.source: If the value of **Maximum** or **Minimum** is a floating-point number, **Get-Random** returns a randomly selected floating-point number.
trans-unit.target: 如果值 **最大** 或 **最小值** 是浮点数， **Get-random** 返回一个随机选择的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: -SetSeed
trans-unit.target: -SetSeed

trans-unit.source: Specifies a seed value for the random number generator.
trans-unit.target: 为随机数生成程序指定种子值。

trans-unit.source: This seed value is used for the current command and for all subsequent Get-Random commands in the current session until you use SetSeed again or close the session.
trans-unit.target: 在你再次使用 SetSeed 或关闭该会话之前，此种子值将用于当前命令以及当前会话中的所有后续 Get-Random 命令。

trans-unit.source: You cannot reset the seed to its default, clock-based value.
trans-unit.target: 不能将种子重置为其默认的基于时钟的值。

trans-unit.source: The SetSeed parameter is not required.
trans-unit.target: SetSeed 参数不是必需的。

trans-unit.source: By default, Get-Random uses the system clock to generate a seed value.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Get-Random 使用系统时钟生成种子值。

trans-unit.source: Because SetSeed results in non-random behavior, it is typically used only when trying to reproduce behavior, such as when debugging or analyzing a script that includes Get-Random commands.
trans-unit.target: 因为 SetSeed 会引起非随机行为，所以通常仅当尝试重现行为（例如调试或分析包括 Get-Random 命令的脚本）时才使用它。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.Object
trans-unit.target: System.Object

trans-unit.source: You can pipe one or more objects to **Get-Random**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递一个或多个对象与 **Get-random**。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Random** selects values randomly from the piped objects.
trans-unit.target: **Get-random** 从管道对象中随机选择的值。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: System.Int32, System.Int64, System.Double
trans-unit.target: System.Int32，System.Int64、 System.Double

trans-unit.source: **Get-Random** returns an integer or floating-point number, or an object selected randomly from a submitted collection.
trans-unit.target: **Get-random** 返回一个整数或浮点数或从提交的集合中随机选择的对象。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: **Get-Random** sets a default seed for each session based on the system time clock when the session starts.
trans-unit.target: **Get-random** 为会话启动时，将根据系统时钟每个会话设置默认种子。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in Windows PowerShell 3.0, **Get-Random** supports 64-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: 从 Windows PowerShell 3.0 开始 **Get-random** 支持 64 位整数。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 2.0, all values are cast to System.Int32.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 2.0 中，所有值都转换为 System.Int32。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
